class.name: AbilitySystemAbility
class.brief_description: Base resource for defining gameplay abilities.

method.name: _activate_ability
method.description: Virtual method to implement the ability's logic.

method.name: _can_activate_ability
method.description: Virtual method to implement custom activation requirements.

method.name: _on_end_ability
method.description: Virtual method called when the ability ends.

method.name: can_activate_ability
method.description: Returns true if the ability can be activated by the pointer owner.

method.name: end_ability
method.description: Ends the ability execution and cleans up tags.

members.member: The unique tag identifying this ability.
Ability cannot activate if owner has any of these tags.
Tags granted to the owner while the ability is active.
Owner must have all of these tags to activate.
Effect applied to owner to represent the cooldown.
Effect applied to owner to consume resources (Mana, Stamina).
